main.model.stocks

Class Stock

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.model.stocks.Stock
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommonStock, PreferredStock

    public abstract class Stock
extends java.lang.Object
    The stock abstract class provides common functionality utilised for the preferred and common stock classes. Calculations pertaining to individual stocks are provided by this class and it's sub-classes.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    andersarchibald
